#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: Placemark.

= Description =

A Placemark is a point sized mark on a golf course.

= Attributes =

The element has the following attributes:

# Type - The type of Placemark. Placemark Types must conform to a list of valid values. (See [[CommonAttributesAndElements Domain and Domain Values]].)
# Orientation - Orientation of the Placemark. Placemark Orientations must conform to a list of valid values. (See [[CommonAttributesAndElements Domain and Domain Values]].)

= Elements = 

== Descriptive Elements ==

The element has the following descriptive elements:

 # Name - Name, or title, or label of the Placemark.


== Structural Elements ==

The element has the following structural elements:

 # [[Position]].
